Company Overview.Name: Hoac Foods India Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Manufacturer of flour, spice, and other food products.  Markets and sells flour (chakki atta), herbs & spices, unpolished pulses, grains, and yellow mustard oil in and around Delhi-NCR through exclusive brand outlets under the "HARIOM" brand.
